positions.title: Owner / Full Stack Software Engineer
description:
Various projects, many on MERN stack, for example:
- [greeter](https://freshman.dev/greeter): social diary. AI/LLM social assistant feature
- [wordbase](https://freshman.dev/wordbase): discontinued word game remake with support for 5 user-requested languages
- [wordle bot leaderboard](https://freshman.dev/wordle/leaderboard): main leaderboard for Wordle solvers, 300+ submissions
Accepted into startup incubator [RIHub](https://rihub.org/), 1k organic user signups

positions.title: Software Engineer
description:
Developed new path planning API for autonomous warehouse vehicles ([demo](https://freshman.dev/raw/paths))
Implemented event stream processor for vehicle allocation inputs
Optimized tier-1 data pipeline ecosystem to improve scaling of accessor API by 1500%
Designed internal alarming library used across adjacent teams
Simplified management of client throttling system and collaborated on new self-service workflow
Mentored intern project
Earned the highest possible raise each year and left after 2.5 years

positions.title: Software Development Intern
description:
Developed full-stack feature for MATLAB Online’s Import Tool
Implemented several UI elements for MATLAB’s Property Inspector, including colormap ([detail](https://freshman.dev/raw/cv/MathWorks/colormap))
Created performance test/report to track progress on MATLAB Online graphics optimization

positions.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
description:
589 Machine Learning – 514 Data Science – 583 Game Programming – 383 Artificial Intelligence
403 Robotics – 326 Web Programming – 611 Advanced Algorithms – MATH MVCalc LinAlg DiffEq

positions.title: Semester Abroad
description: 373 Computer Graphics – 351 Database Systems – 345 Human-Computer Interaction

positions.title: 3D Game Development in Unity
description: Designed rally-car couch game with Nintendo Joy-Cons for player input ([link](https://freshman.dev/matchbox))

positions.title: Hierarchical Control System for Simulated Pong-Playing Robot
description: Composed behavior from low-level PD controllers to integrated gameplay for course competition

positions.title: Hackathon Competition
description: Won ‘Most Innovative’ for idea with random group while studying at University of Auckland

positions.title: Team Lead, Competitive Programming Interest Group
description:
Qualified at BOSPRE Preliminary as first-time ICPC competitor ([scoreboard](https://hc3.seas.harvard.edu/hc3/bospre/2017/scoreboard.web))
Achieved 6th place of 17 in the 2017 Northeast North America Regional Contest ([scoreboard](https://icpc.global/regionals/finder/northeast-north-america-2018/standings))
- new team competing against established teams from e.g. MIT, Harvard
- responsible for 3.5 of 4 team points

positions.title: Secretary, Association for Computing Machinery (ACM) Student Chapter

description:
Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, C/C++, Kotlin, Ruby, C#, MATLAB, HTML/CSS
MERN stack (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS), SQL, Redis
Chrome DevTools, Git, Unix shell, AWS, REST APIs, Service-Oriented Architecture, Agile
